translation.en: ♪ Keep straight ahead For the most glorious place ♪
translation.es: Sigue hacia el lugar más maravilloso

translation.en: ♪ On the face of the Earth and the sky ♪
♪ Hold onto your breath Hold onto your heart ♪
translation.es: Contén la respiración, contén el corazón

translation.en: ♪ Hold onto your hope ♪
♪ Walk up to the gate and let it open ♪
Investigation, since when? And why are you just telling me this now?
translation.es: ¿Investigación? ¿Desde cuándo? ¿Y por qué me cuentas ahora?

translation.en: Because I just got added last week.
Knowing you'd have this sort of calm and thoughtful response,
I can't imagine why I didn't bring it up sooner.
translation.es: no sé por qué no lo mencioné antes.

translation.en: What part of terrorists killing each other
and criminals turning themselves in bothers you, Dad?
translation.es: criminales que se entregan. ¿Qué te molesta?

translation.en: Why exactly are they doing that, son?
- They're doing it because of Kira. - Right, and who is that?
translation.es: - Lo hacen por Kira. - Sí, ¿y ese quién es?

translation.en: How does Kira get to decide who lives and dies, who's guilty and innocent?
translation.es: ¿Por qué decide quién vive y quién muere?

translation.en: Is there a complaints department if I don't like one of Kira's decisions?
translation.es: ¿Hay a quién reclamar si objeto su decisión?

translation.en: Or would complaining get me put on Kira's list?
translation.es: ¿O acabaré en su lista si me quejo?

translation.en: Is that what everybody at the station thinks?
Well, it's safe to say I'm ahead of the curve on that one.
translation.es: Digamos que en esto estoy por mi cuenta.

translation.en: Hey, how do I look?
- Good. - All right. See you this afternoon.
translation.es: - Bien. - Bueno. Te veo a la tarde.

translation.en: - Turner. - Just got a call from the FBI.
Apparently, they got someone who wants to speak with you.
- Oh, yeah? And who is that? - They're not really saying.
Just said he helped them out before and he's got a theory on the Kira situation.
translation.es: Solo que ayudó otras veces y que tiene una teoría sobre Kira.

translation.en: - I just got the case. What does he want? - I have no idea.
translation.es: - Acabo de entrar. ¿Qué quiere? - Ni idea.

translation.en: They said he's a little different.
In fact, they'll probably send a representative...
translation.es: Que quizá envíe a un delegado...

translation.en: Detective Turner?
I am to meet with Detective Turner,
local head of the Kira investigation, in his office at 9:00 a.m.
translation.es: encargado del caso Kira, en su oficina a las 9:00 a. m.

translation.en: Call you back.
- What can I do for you? - I am Watari.
Your fellow officers did that?
Cops don't like it when you go after other cops,
translation.es: A los policías les molesta que persigan policías,

translation.en: but, apparently, they hate it when you go after their god.
translation.es: pero odian que persigan a su dios.

translation.en: They support Kira?
Kira's doing away with the Most Wanted list.
These guys wanna throw him a parade.
But now that rumor has it Kira's a cop, it's in my world.
translation.es: Pero con el rumor de que es un policía, debo intervenir.

translation.en: The idea that Kira is associated with law enforcement is not a rumor.
translation.es: La idea de que Kira tiene relación con las fuerzas del orden no es un rumor.

translation.en: It is a fact,
uncovered by the individual I work with.
translation.es: descubierto por alguien con quien trabajo.

translation.en: - Oh, yeah, and who's that? - He goes by the letter L.
L is real?
You're familiar?
Yeah, I hear things.
That giant smuggling ring in Eastern Europe,
translation.es: La red de contrabando de Europa oriental,

translation.en: practically handed to police on a platter.
L would like to speak with you regarding the Kira investigation.
translation.es: L desea hablar con usted sobre Kira.

translation.en: - Okay. When? - Right now.
- Hmm, Detective Turner. - What is this?
A one- time offer.
I'd like to assist you in the capture of Kira.
translation.es: Quiero ayudarlo a atrapar a Kira.

translation.en: Why me? The FBI, CIA have hundreds of men on this.
translation.es: ¿A mí? El FBI y la CIA tienen a cientos de hombres en esto.

translation.en: I've been in communication with Interpol and the FBI,
translation.es: Estoy comunicado con Interpol y el FBI,

translation.en: but I believe you have something they do not.
translation.es: pero usted tiene algo que ellos no.

translation.en: What's that?
An in- depth understanding of potential suspects.
Why would I have a better understanding?
The FBI thinks the killer is operating out of Japan.
translation.es: El FBI cree que el asesino opera desde Japón.

translation.en: Because of the name Kira.
Ah, but the name is an intentional misdirection.
translation.es: Pero el nombre es una pista falsa.

translation.en: He wants us to believe that he's Japanese, operating a half a world away.
translation.es: Para que lo creamos japonés cuando opera al otro lado del mundo.

translation.en: He's not.
Kira's in Seattle.
Shall we help one another?
Justice for the Wicked. What is this?
It's a site for Kira worshipers.
translation.es: Un sitio de devotos de Kira.

translation.en: They put up names of people that deserve to die.
Holy shit.
Rapists, pedophiles,
human trafficking, murder.
This guy killed four people in a house fire.
translation.es: Este mató a cuatro en un incendio.

translation.en: I don't know. How do we know that it's real?
translation.es: No lo sé. ¿Cómo saber si es real?

translation.en: What do you mean?
What if somebody fucked your girlfriend and you put him on the list to kill him?
translation.es: ¿Y si alguien se coge a tu novia y lo pones en la lista?

translation.en: What would you do if some guy fucked me?
translation.es: ¿Y si alguien me cogiera a mí?

translation.en: - Oh, I'd kill him. - Yeah?
- Yeah. - You'd kill him?
- Yeah. - You'd kill him?
But that is the reason why we can't kill people based on website rumors.
translation.es: Por eso no podemos matar gente por rumores en Internet.

translation.en: It's not like that.
These are real people with real problems, and they've been ignored.
translation.es: Son gente de verdad que sufre y que nadie escucha.

translation.en: They need our help.
Figured you'd be older.
And that I'd be able to see more of your face.
translation.es: Y que le vería la cara.

translation.en: Yes, well, I find I'm not in a very trusting mood these days.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, no estoy muy confiado últimamente.

translation.en: I took the liberty of moving your evidence to a more secure location.
translation.es: Me atreví a trasladar sus pruebas a un lugar más seguro.

translation.en: Oh, I can see that. Were you gonna let me know or...?
Wow, this is very, very impressive, James. Your men must be proud.
translation.es: Vaya. Qué impactante, James. Sus hombres estarán orgullosos.

translation.en: Ask your partner how my men think about me these days.
So you did all of this yourself?
Even more impressive.
Please, James, have a seat. Rest your glutes.
Mm- mmm. You've made two mistakes.
This is zero day, Kira's first recorded murders.
translation.es: Este es el día cero, la aparición de Kira.

translation.en: But previously, on April 15th, convicted felon James W. Brode
translation.es: Pero antes, el 15 de abril, el convicto James W. Brode

translation.en: had taken his wife and children hostage.
translation.es: tomó de rehenes a su esposa e hijos.

translation.en: I remember that. You think that was Kira?
Initial speculation was that his behavior was drug- related,
translation.es: Primero se especuló que estaba drogado,

translation.en: but lost in the ensuing crush of Kira activities
translation.es: pero luego todo el ruido de Kira

translation.en: was the fact that Brode's toxicology had come back clean.
translation.es: opacó que el análisis de Brode dio negativo.

translation.en: The stand- off had never made national news,
and it was only broadcast on local Seattle stations.
translation.es: Solo salió por canales de Seattle.

translation.en: - So that's how you knew he was here. - I infiltrated your network
translation.es: - Por eso dice que está aquí. - Me infiltré su red

translation.en: in order to ensure that there hadn't been a data breach.
translation.es: por si se habían filtrado datos.

translation.en: Prior to my access, the network was intact.
Did you just hand me evidence you hacked the Seattle P.D.?
translation.es: ¿Me da pruebas de que nos hackeó?

translation.en: I handed you evidence that whoever Kira is, they have access to the database from the inside.
translation.es: Le doy pruebas de que Kira tiene acceso a su base de datos.

translation.en: Kira's one of ours.
Here's a cross- reference list of officers and their access
translation.es: Una lista cruzada de agentes y su acceso

translation.en: as well as the dates of Kira activities.
translation.es: y las fechas de las actividades de Kira.

translation.en: The Federal Administration has agreed to make resources available to us.
We can begin seeing who was where when.
translation.es: Veamos quién estuvo dónde y cuándo.

translation.en: - What are you gonna do? - I'd like to start by speaking with Kira.
translation.es: - ¿Y qué hará usted? - Hablar con Kira, espero.

translation.en: Sure you are.
- Hey. - Light, turn on the news.
The individual known as Kira,
translation.es: El que se hace llamar Kira,

translation.en: as I'm sure you're aware, has taken credit for over 400 deaths.
translation.es: como saben, se adjudicó más de 400 muertes.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
While we don't know how he kills his victims,
translation.es: Aunque no sabemos cómo mata a sus víctimas,

translation.en: we do know how he chooses them.
Prior to these deaths,
all of the victims have had their identities released to the media.
translation.es: su identidad se había publicado en los medios.

translation.en: This would suggest that Kira is not some omnipotent force.
translation.es: De modo que Kira no es una fuerza omnipotente.

translation.en: He's a person...
like you or me.
He is also a coward.
A child wielding power he does not understand,
translation.es: Un niño con un poder que lo supera

translation.en: mistakenly believing in doing so, he's at no risk to himself.
translation.es: y que cree no correr riesgos.

translation.en: He's wrong.
Kira, if you're watching this, know that I am coming for you.
translation.es: Kira, si estás mirando, ten por seguro que voy por ti.

translation.en: Unless, of course, you'd like to kill me right now.
translation.es: A menos que me mates ahora mismo, claro.

translation.en: Now I'm rooting for this guy.
Would you shut the fuck up?
No?
Well, in that case, Kira,
I shall be meeting you face- to- face very shortly.
translation.es: muy pronto nos veremos frente a frente.

translation.en: Who does this guy think he is?
What the fuck was that?
I have a theory.
Kira cannot kill by simply sight alone.
translation.es: Kira no puede matar solo con la vista.

translation.en: He needs a name and a face.
translation.es: Necesita un nombre y un rostro.

translation.en: Every victim we've seen so far fits this pattern.
translation.es: Todas las víctimas encajan en ese patrón.

translation.en: So you antagonize him on purpose?
While withholding my identity from the record.
Now, we know that he wants to kill me but is unable.
translation.es: Sabemos que quiere matarme, pero no puede.

translation.en: And what if you're wrong?
Then, James, I'd be dead.
Either way, we'll have gained valuable information.
He always pull this kind of stuff?
You guys getting close to catching Kira?
Oh, I'd say the haystack's down to a hay pile. Still a lot of hay.
translation.es: Pasamos del pajar a una pila de paja. Igual es mucha paja.

translation.en: I saw the press conference today.
Who's that guy on TV with the turtleneck?
You like that look? I'm thinking of taking it myself.
translation.es: ¿Te gusta el estilo? Estoy pensando en adoptarlo.

translation.en: Goes by L. He's an independent investigator.
translation.es: Se hace llamar L. Un investigador independiente.

translation.en: Wow, so you don't even know his real name.
translation.es: Vaya, ni siquiera sabes su nombre.

translation.en: About the only thing I know is he's got some handler named Watari.
translation.es: Solo sé que tiene un ayudante llamado Watari.

translation.en: Really likes ice cream.
He's connected an awful lot of dots.
Do you think he's connected the dots because he's Kira?
translation.es: ¿Los habrá conectado porque él es KIra?

translation.en: I don't think so.
He has a history of cracking big cases.
Besides, I think you can tell when you're sitting across from a killer like Kira.
translation.es: Y si estás frente a un asesino como Kira, creo que te das cuenta.

translation.en: Right. Of course.
What happens when they catch Kira?
Well... he's murdered over 400 people,
translation.es: Pues, asesinó a más de 400 personas,

translation.en: so, my guess...
it's probably gonna be a fight between those who want to hang him
translation.es: que los que quieran colgarlo lucharán

translation.en: and those who want to dissect him and figure out how he did it.
translation.es: con los que quieran diseccionarlo y averiguar cómo lo hizo.

translation.en: - You okay? - Yeah.
You put someone on my kid?
We agreed that everyone with access needed to be thoroughly vetted.
translation.es: Acordamos observar a todos los que tuvieran acceso.

translation.en: I did not see it prudent to have you investigate yourself.
translation.es: Juzgué imprudente que usted se investigara.

translation.en: What? We're not talking about investigating me.
translation.es: ¿De qué habla? No se trata de mí.

translation.en: We're talking about having my son followed!
I investigated you prior to offering my assistance and concluded you are not Kira.
translation.es: A usted lo investigué antes de llamarlo y concluí que no era Kira.

translation.en: As for your son, he may have access to databases around which we have centered our search.
translation.es: Su hijo puede tener acceso a las bases en las que nos centramos.

translation.en: Therefore, deserves the same scrutiny as anyone else that fits that criteria.
translation.es: De modo que amerita el mismo escrutinio que cualquier otro.

translation.en: - No, he's a kid! - Yes.
- A particularly bright kid. - You know what?
If you had any questions about my son, you should've come to me.
translation.es: Si quería saber sobre mi hijo, debió preguntarme a mí.

translation.en: Here you go.
Even if they're suspicious, I don't see how they can prove it.
I think we just go quiet until they stop following us.
translation.es: Paremos hasta que dejen de seguirnos.

translation.en: - What do you mean go quiet? - Stop fucking around with theDeath Note.
translation.es: - ¿Qué sería parar? - Dejar de joder con la libreta.

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?
Come on, Light. Just get rid of them. All we need is a name.
translation.es: Deshazte de ellos. Un nombre y los tenemos.

translation.en: - I'm not gonna do that. - Not gonna do what?
- I was talking to Ryuk. - I like this one, Light.
translation.es: - Es Ryuk. - Me cae bien, Light.

translation.en: - She has wonderful ideas. - What'd he say?
Ryuk? Not much.
- We're good. They're trying to stop us. - We don't kill innocent people, Mia.
translation.es: Nosotros somos los buenos. No matamos inocentes.

translation.en: Even if I wanted to, which I don't,
taking out the guy following us will only indicate that it's me.
translation.es: si mato al que nos sigue, me incrimino.

translation.en: You'd have to get rid of all the agents, regardless of who they're following.
translation.es: Debes matar a todos los agentes, sigan a quien sigan.

translation.en: They wouldn't know who it was,
but they'd know what happens when you fuck with Kira.
translation.es: pero sí qué pasa si se meten con Kira.

translation.en: - Can't believe you're saying this. - Cant believe you're not.
translation.es: - No digas eso. - Es lo que pienso.

translation.en: Then I guess we're really fucking lucky that it's my book.
translation.es: Pues qué suerte que la libreta sea mía.

translation.en: Kira has been strangely inactive of late,
something authorities are eager to point to
as evidence their investigation is gaining momentum.
translation.es: como indicio de que la investigación avanza.

translation.en: However, Kira supporters have begun to criticize police
translation.es: Pero los defensores de Kira critican a la policía

translation.en: for suppressing its activities,
as a small but noticeable spike in global crime
translation.es: por el alza, pequeña pero visible,

translation.en: has become apparent in the absence of recent activities from the phenomena.
translation.es: registrada en el crimen mundial gracias a esa tregua.

translation.en: Are you leaving?
Yeah, I've got some work to do.
There's a guy on the news who killed a couple kids.
translation.es: Un tipo mató a unos niños.

translation.en: I thought maybe we could make some popcorn, take some names down for later.
translation.es: Pensé en hacer palomitas y anotar algunos nombres para después.

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
Director Pearl. These just came in from the field offices.
translation.es: Señor Pearl. Esto acaba de llegar de la oficina local.

translation.en: Tell them to keep surveillance on all the potential--
Assistant Director Pearl is dead. Heart attack, just now.
We need to contact every FBI agent on their team.
translation.es: Contacten a todos los agentes del FBI del equipo.

translation.en: This is Franks.
Agent Franks, your team has been compromised.
translation.es: Agente, su equipo está en riesgo.

translation.en: Drop what you're doing and get to the nearest hospital. Right now.
translation.es: Deje todo y vaya al hospital más cercano.

translation.en: Agent Franks?
Agent Franks, can you hear me?
Twelve FBI agents mysteriously commit suicide.
translation.es: Doce agentes del FBI se suicidaron misteriosamente.

translation.en: Some sources say it was the work of Kira.
translation.es: Algunas fuentes afirman que es obra de Kira.

translation.en: This is the first time Kira has attacked law enforcement.
translation.es: Kira nunca había atacado a las fuerzas del orden.

translation.en: - Slow down for one second? - He did it! Son of a bitch killed them.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes parar? - ¡Fue él! El maldito los mató.

translation.en: - Ryuk? - There's so many rules in that thing!
There must be some kind of loophole.
What's he gonna do if you go after him?
Maybe you just need to take a minute and relax
and see if this was the best thing that could've happened.
translation.es: si esto no fue para mejor.

translation.en: No.
Ryuk!
You think I'm some dog, Light?
You can just snap your fingers and I'll come running?
translation.es: ¿Crees que chasqueas los dedos y vengo corriendo?

translation.en: - Did you kill those FBI agents? - What do you think?
translation.es: - ¿Tú mataste a los del FBI? - ¿Qué te parece?

translation.en: I decide who dies, you obey me. Those are the rules.
translation.es: Yo digo quién muere. Tú obedeces. Son las reglas.

translation.en: - Who do you think wrote the rules? - Whose side are you on?
There are no sides, only the game.
translation.es: No hay lados, solo está el juego.

translation.en: And I knew eventually you wouldn't be able to handle playing.
translation.es: Y ya sabía que sería demasiado para ti.

translation.en: I asked politely, but you didn't hear me.
translation.es: Te pregunté de buen modo y no oíste.

translation.en: Let the note go.
Look at the strife it's causing you and your little girlfriend.
translation.es: Les trae problemas a ti y a tu noviecita.

translation.en: Let me find it a new home. We'll be free of each other.
translation.es: Le encontraré un nuevo hogar y te dejaré en paz.

translation.en: I'm not gonna give the note to you or anybody else,
translation.es: No le daré la libreta a nadie.

translation.en: and if you fuck with me again, I'm gonna put your name in it.
translation.es: Y si vuelves a joderme, escribiré tu nombre.

translation.en: You could try.
But I warn you, there are four letters in my name.
translation.es: Pero te advierto: mi nombre tiene cuatro letras.

translation.en: Most anyone's ever gotten were two.
translation.es: Y lo máximo que llegaron a escribir fueron dos.

translation.en: We interrupt this to take you live to an announcement...
translation.es: Interrumpimos este programa por un anuncio urgente...

translation.en: - What the fuck is he doing? - ...by James Turner,
local head of the Kira investigation.
Oh, shit.
Those of you that harbored any illusions about what Kira really is,
translation.es: Los que se hayan hecho ilusiones sobre Kira,

translation.en: the cold- blooded murder of a dozen FBI agents
translation.es: asesino de doce agentes del FBI,

translation.en: should lay bare his true nature.
Kira is a cowardly criminal thug concerned only with self- preservation.
translation.es: Kira es un cobarde matón que solo piensa en sí mismo.

translation.en: Not only is he unworthy
of the veneration and celebration he's received in certain circles,
translation.es: de la veneración que se le profesa en ciertos círculos.

translation.en: as of today, he's not even worthy of our fear.
translation.es: Desde hoy, tampoco es digno de nuestro temor.

translation.en: Understand this, Kira.
You may strike me down, but another one will stand up and take my place.
translation.es: Puedes eliminarme, pero otro tomará mi lugar.

translation.en: Why would he do that? He's forcing Kira to retaliate.
translation.es: ¿Qué hace? Lo obliga a tomar represalias.

translation.en: ...and another for as long as need be.
We will not waiver.
- Because he's not afraid. - We will not submit.
And we will not fail.
Where is it?
What? Are you out of your mind? That's my fucking dad!
Yeah, and he just dared us to kill him on live television.
translation.es: Sí, y acaba de retarnos a matarlo en vivo.

translation.en: Think people are gonna be on their knees if he can talk to Kira like that?
translation.es: ¿Van a obedecernos si le habla así a Kira?

translation.en: We're not killing my dad! This is over! Ryuk fucked us! We're not the good guys anymore.
translation.es: ¡No vamos a matarlo! ¡Ryuk nos jodió! Ya no somos los buenos.

translation.en: What happened to the boy that wanted the world to get what he got?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue del que quería compartir su don con todos?

translation.en: Think about your mom, Light.
Either Kira stands up or they hunt us down.
translation.es: Si Kira no actúa, nos tienen.

translation.en: If you want out, then just get the fuck out!
So you just want to quit?
I don't know.
Well said, James. Tell me, are you truly ready to give your life?
translation.es: Bien dicho, James. Dígame, ¿en serio está dispuesto a dar la vida?

translation.en: If that's what it takes.
How long will it take him to decide, I wonder?
translation.es: Me pregunto cuánto le llevará decidirse.

translation.en: What's going on?
Let me take this.
- Turner. - This is L.
Just making sure you hadn't died.
Still here.
Excellent. Carry on.
I'm really proud of you.
Understand this, Kira.
- You may strike me down... - Sir?
- ...but another will take my place. - Light Turner is Kira.
translation.es: - ...tomará mi lugar. - Light Turner es Kira.

translation.en: - And another and another... - How long since you've slept?
- ...for as long as need be. - Thirty- one hours.
- We will not waiver. We will not submit. - Sleep is key to strong thought.
translation.es: - No nos rendiremos. - Dormir es clave para pensar claramente.

translation.en: - Trust me. - And we will not fail.
Nothing's gonna change once I wake up.
Hello, Light.
You're the guy. You're L.
Yeah, well, it's not my real name.
But I'm sure you're painfully aware of that.
translation.es: Pero seguro lo tienes bien presente.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Following a lead. You?
Um... I was just... I'm leaving.
I wonder if it was a difficult decision.
If what was a difficult decision?
Sparing your father's life.
Sorry, what are you talking about?
You must've known it would implicate you, yet you couldn't bring yourself to do it.
translation.es: No hacerlo te incrimina, pero no pudiste.

translation.en: I'll admit, I always wondered if you had a line.
translation.es: Me preguntaba si tenías un límite.

translation.en: I guess it's fortunate for us,
the line you finally decided to draw points so clearly in your direction.
translation.es: el límite que por fin pusiste apunta claramente en tu dirección.

translation.en: - So you really think I'm Kira. - No, I know it.
translation.es: - Crees que soy Kira. - Lo sé.

translation.en: If you're so sure, why haven't you just arrested me?
Because I don't do check, Light. Only checkmate.
translation.es: Porque yo no hago jaque. Solo jaque mate.

translation.en: - But we'll be there soon enough. - Great. Until then, enjoy the gelato.
translation.es: - Pero falta poco. - Genial. Disfruta tu helado.

translation.en: Assuming you can eat through that thing. And I'll just, uh...
translation.es: Si es que puedes comer con eso. Y yo...

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Yeah.
How do you think he does it? Kira.
I was hoping you could shed some light on that for me.
I have a theory.
I think that it's some form of remote viewing
translation.es: Creo que es una especie de visualización

translation.en: coupled with maybe some latent psychic ability of some sort. Am I close?
So you really have no idea, do you?
Well, I have several ideas.
Eventually, you'll tell me which is correct.
translation.es: Ya me dirás cuál es cierta.

translation.en: What if it turned out that all arresting Kira did
was give that power to someone else, someone potentially much worse.
translation.es: se le da ese poder a otro, que puede ser mucho peor?

translation.en: You're suggesting the ability is somehow transferable.
translation.es: Sugieres que es una capacidad transferible.

translation.en: I'm suggesting maybe what you and the person you're after want isn't so different.
translation.es: Sugiero que quizá tú y tu presa quieran algo similar.

translation.en: Maybe they're as ready to see the killing end as you are.
translation.es: Quizá él desee acabar esto tanto como tú.

translation.en: And if that were true, perhaps now would be a good time
translation.es: Y, si así fuera, sería buen momento

translation.en: to start helping them instead of hunting them.
Helping...
You know what I think, Light? I think you want to make a deal.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué creo, Light? Que quieres hacer un trato.

translation.en: Good deals are made by those in a position of strength.
translation.es: Para eso, hay que tener ventaja.

translation.en: Criminals, such as yourself, never make those deals.
translation.es: Los criminales como tú no hacen tratos.

translation.en: What they do is wait until they're caught and then they beg.
translation.es: Esperan a que los atrapen, y entonces suplican.

translation.en: I'm not begging. I'm telling you that you don't understand.
translation.es: No estoy suplicando. Te digo que no entiendes.

translation.en: Let me put this in terms you're more familiar with.
A man kills 400 people.
He tells us that it's complicated, that he's misunderstood.
translation.es: Nos dice que es complicado, que no lo entienden.

translation.en: Do you think that Kira would hear his excuses or walk him off a bridge?
translation.es: ¿Crees que Kira oiría sus excusas o lo empujaría de un puente?

translation.en: Think you're better than me, but you're trying to kill Kira!
translation.es: ¡Te crees mejor que yo, pero quieres matar a Kira!

translation.en: - Kira, Kira, Kira! - I do not kill, Light!
I don't even carry a gun, it's distracting.
What I do is bring people to justice.
translation.es: Yo llevo gente a la justicia.

translation.en: But the form it takes is their own making. A consequence of their actions, not mine.
translation.es: Pero es su responsabilidad. Consecuencia de sus actos.

translation.en: You're the one who flew into the sun.
I'm just here to make sure you actually burn.
translation.es: Yo solo me aseguro de que te quemes.

translation.en: - Well, if that's how it has to be. - It is, Light!
You know that as well as I do. There are no draws in this game.
translation.es: Lo sabes tan bien como yo. En este juego no hay empate.

translation.en: - Please, you have to forgive me. - It was my dad, Mia.
If I could take it back, I would. I promise. I was just scared.
translation.es: No debí decirlo. Me asusté, nada más.

translation.en: Do you think I'm not scared?
I'm a fucking cheerleader, Light.
Nothing I do has ever mattered until I met you.
translation.es: No hice nada valioso hasta que te conocí.

translation.en: I made a mistake. If I could take it back, I would. I just...
I wasn't ready to lose you.
I love you.
I love you.
L showed me his face.
I'm gonna get his name, and I'm gonna stop him.
translation.es: Averiguaré su nombre y lo detendré.

translation.en: That's Watari. He's L's right- hand man.
translation.es: Ese es Watari. Su mano derecha.

translation.en: If anybody's gonna give us L's real name, it's gonna be him.
translation.es: Si alguien sabe el nombre de L, es él.

translation.en: All right.
Watari becomes obsessed
with revealing the true identity of the detective known as 'L.'
translation.es: con revelar la identidad de L.

translation.en: For the next 48 hours, he will cease all communication with the outside world,
translation.es: En las próximas 48 horas, cortará toda comunicación

translation.en: except to update what he learns to the number 206- 555- 0166.
translation.es: excepto para informar lo que sabe al teléfono 206-555-0166.

translation.en: At 7:00 p.m., on October 12th, he dies.
translation.es: A las 7:00 p. m. del 12 de octubre, muere.

translation.en: You didn't say how he dies.
- It doesn't matter, it's dealer's choice. - What?
Huh? Oh, I was talking to Ryuk. Sorry.
- So kill his friend to get his name? - No, I'm not gonna kill Watari.
translation.es: - ¿Matarás al amigo? - No voy a matar a Watari.

translation.en: That's the best part.
Rule 89 says:
If the person who writes a name destroys its page
translation.es: Si quien escribe destruye la hoja

translation.en: prior to the death being carried out, the target will be spared.
translation.es: antes de que se ejecute la muerte, la orden se cancela.

translation.en: So if I burn Watari's page before October 12th at 7:00 p.m...
translation.es: Si quemo esa hoja antes de las siete del 12 de octubre,

translation.en: then nothing bad happens, right, Ryuk?
Only one name can be removed from the Death Note by burning it.
translation.es: Un solo nombre puede quitarse quemándolo.

translation.en: Get this one wrong, you won't get another chance.
translation.es: Si sale mal, no habrá otra oportunidad.

translation.en: I only get one page to burn.
- Hello? - My name is Watari.
- This information is not known to me. - I'm sorry. What do you mean?
translation.es: - Esta información me es desconocida. - ¿Cómo dice?

translation.en: I took responsibility for L
only after he left the St. Martin's orphanage in Montauk
translation.es: cuando salió del orfanato St. Martin de Montauk,

translation.en: where he was one of the Rochester wards.
translation.es: donde fue uno de los pupilos de Rochester.

translation.en: One of the... Sorry, what is a Rochester ward?
They were orphans trained since childhood
to become the greatest detectives the world had ever seen.
translation.es: para ser los mejores detectives de la historia.

translation.en: - You've gotta be kidding me. - I am not.
For their first test, the wards were placed in a conditioning vault.
translation.es: Como primera prueba, los pusieron en una bóveda de entrenamiento.

translation.en: Those who retained their sanity after seven months
translation.es: Los que estaban cuerdos después de siete meses

translation.en: were initiated into the program.
L joined at six, the youngest candidate ever.
translation.es: L empezó a los seis años. Fue el candidato más joven.

translation.en: Okay, but what was his name before the vault or whatever?
translation.es: Bueno, pero ¿cómo se llamaba antes de la bóveda y todo eso?

translation.en: That name exists now only in their records.
translation.es: Ese nombre solo figura en sus registros.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. Watari, you need to go there right now.
translation.es: Tienes que ir ya mismo a buscarlo.

translation.en: I should like to rest first.
Sleep is key to strong thought.
translation.es: Dormir es clave para pensar claramente.

translation.en: No. You don't have any time to sleep. You have 48 hours to get a name.
translation.es: No hay tiempo para dormir. Tienes 48 horas.

translation.en: What happens in 48 hours?
- You just need to go right now. - I will go.
translation.es: - Tienes que ir ya mismo. - Iré.

translation.en: - Leave him alive, it's a loose end. - You don't need to help, Mia.
translation.es: - Si vive, es un cabo suelto. - No me ayudes, Mia.

translation.en: Of course I do.
I'm not gonna leave you alone in this.
I'm telling you, I wore an actual top hat.
translation.es: Lo juro, me puse un sombrero de copa.

translation.en: - And was that with your wife or...? - No.
translation.es: - ¿Eso fue con su esposa o...? - No.

translation.en: Frankly, she wouldn't have been caught within ten miles of me.
translation.es: Nunca se dejó ver conmigo en el colegio.

translation.en: I didn't get this cool until much later.
translation.es: Tardé en ponerme así de encantador.

translation.en: Hello. Nice to meet you. Leave.
What are you doing here?
We have a critical issue that requires discussion immediately.
- Kids, give us a couple minutes. - Sure.
No, wait, wait, wait.
Not you, Light.
The discussion concerns you.
How?
Watari has disappeared.
I've known him my entire life.
translation.es: Lo conozco de toda la vida.

translation.en: He has not, would not, could not leave without me being sure of his plans.
translation.es: Jamás podría irse sin avisarme. Jamás lo hizo.

translation.en: - Okay, let me make a call. - What is it that you want?
- Sorry, I don't have any idea. - I get that this has got you upset.
translation.es: - Lo siento, no tengo idea. - Entiendo su malestar.

translation.en: Your son is Kira, James!
What?
Don't know why you haven't been able to put one and one together,
translation.es: No sé por qué no lo ve,

translation.en: even despite him having spared your life,
but it does not speak well to your deductive abilities at all.
translation.es: pero no habla bien de sus aptitudes.

translation.en: It's time to leave.
- I'm not going anywhere. - Wanna fucking bet?
I have a search warrant and a team of men outside.
translation.es: Tengo una orden de allanamiento y hombres afuera.

translation.en: So, as I said, I will be staying. You? You have managed a strong move.
translation.es: Así que, como dije, me quedo. Hiciste una jugada fuerte.

translation.en: Now, provided that you return Watari to me safely,
translation.es: Si devuelves a Watari sano y salvo,

translation.en: I'm willing to put your position of strength into account.
translation.es: estoy dispuesto a considerar tu posición de ventaja.

translation.en: I'm sorry about your friend. I'm sure he'll be fine.
translation.es: Lamento lo de su amigo. Seguro estará bien.

translation.en: - Damn it! You don't have-- -
You have crossed the line!
Force me to do the same and I assure you you will not survive!
translation.es: ¡Si me obligas a hacer lo mismo, no sobrevivirás!

translation.en: You threaten my son again, I'll fucking kill you!
translation.es: ¡Amenace a mi hijo de nuevo y lo mato!

translation.en: Get the fuck out of here!
Tear this place apart! Tear it apart!
- You okay? - Mm- hmm.
Yeah.
Has nothing to do with you, son.
translation.es: No tiene nada que ver contigo.

translation.en: I knew he was off the minute I met him.
translation.es: Supe que estaba loco apenas lo conocí.

translation.en: You know what happens when they find it.
translation.es: Sabes qué pasará cuando la encuentren.

translation.en: It ends up my book again, Light.
translation.es: La libreta será mía otra vez.

translation.en: And guess what name I'm gonna suggest we start with when I find it a new home?
translation.es: Y adivina con qué nombre sugeriré que empiece en su nuevo hogar.

translation.en: Is there...
anything I need to know?
How do you do it?
- How you handle all this? - What do you mean?
How do you handle having everybody against you? You're screwed either way.
translation.es: De tener a todos en contra. Sea como sea, pierdes.

translation.en: Yeah, one way or another, we're all in the middle.
translation.es: Sea como sea, todos estamos en el medio.

translation.en: Things are never black and white.
Sometimes you just...
you just have to choose the lesser of two evils.
translation.es: hay que elegir el mal menor.

translation.en: ♪ And the sky ♪
translation.es: Y del cielo NUEVA YORK, EL ESTADO IMPERIAL

translation.en: ♪ Hold onto your breath Hold onto your heart ♪
translation.es: Contén la respiración, contén el corazón

translation.en: ♪ Hold onto your heart ♪
♪ Walk up to the gate ♪ ♪ Walk up to the gate ♪
♪ And look up ♪
He's coming out of the house right now. I want a car on him. Every move.
translation.es: Está saliendo. Que lo siga un auto. ¡No lo pierdan!

translation.en: - Hello. - Where are you? What's taking so long?
- I'm on my way to St. Martin's. - Well, how much longer?
I hope to find it within the next few hours.
Find it? You don't know where it is?
It was never intended to be a place that was easily accessed.
translation.es: No fue pensado como un lugar de fácil acceso.

translation.en: Okay, just hurry.
This is a reminder.
Time is running out to purchase your Winter Dance tickets.
translation.es: Queda poco tiempo para comprar entradas al baile.

translation.en: - Hey. - This is for tonight.
Also comes with this. You're really gonna stand out.
translation.es: Viene con esto. Vaya que te destacarás.

translation.en: You really think I give a shit about Homecoming?
Look in the hat.
They're never gonna stop following you.
We're gonna end this once and for all, but I need you to trust me.
translation.es: Vamos a acabar con esto, pero debes confiar en mí.

translation.en: - Can you do that? - Yeah.
What do you want, Light?
You're not some sadist.
There's always some flimsy justification, some reason that...
translation.es: Siempre hay alguna justificación endeble, alguna razón...

translation.en: Get me the New York field office. Now!
translation.es: Con la oficina de Nueva York. ¡Ya!

translation.en: I've asked Brandon here to dance with me for one. Is that cool with you?
translation.es: Le pedí a Brandon que bailara conmigo. ¿No te molesta?

translation.en: Hey. Where are you?
I've located the records room, but need more time.
translation.es: Hallé los registros, pero preciso tiempo.

translation.en: Only got a few minutes. Is it there or not?
I am confident it is here, but I cannot yet say where.
translation.es: Confío en que sí, pero no sé dónde.

translation.en: Fuck it. Fuck it. Fuck it. Forget it. Just forget it.
No! Mia, what did you do? Where's the page?
- Watari, you have to run right now! Okay? - Watari!
You have to run away as quick as you can!
- Someone's here. - Okay...
Just go to them right now and ask for their help.
I am obsessed with revealing the true identity of...
translation.es: Estoy obsesionado con revelar la identidad de...

translation.en: Yes. It's here.
- What does it say that it is? - L's true name...
- What does it say? What is L's real name? - Sir! Answer me!
Are you Watari?
- I am Watari. - Watari.
Fuck! Fuck!
Ah, you said dealer's choice.
Why didn't you tell me the page was missing?
translation.es: No me dijiste que faltaba la hoja.

translation.en: But then what would you and Mia have to talk about?
translation.es: ¿De qué iban a hablar tú y Mia si no?

translation.en: I told you I like her a lot, Light.
translation.es: Te dije que me caía bien, Light.

translation.en: I know you're probably upset...
but if you freak out, they're gonna be all over us,
translation.es: Pero si te pones loco, esto no acabará bien.

translation.en: - and that's not gonna end well. - You killed him.
translation.es: Pero si te pones loco, esto no acabará bien. Lo mataste.

translation.en: No, Light.
I saved you...
from yourself again.
Because every time things get hard, you leave me to do the real stuff.
translation.es: Porque cuando se pone difícil, dejas que me encargue yo.

translation.en: Oh, my God, it was all you.
Ryuk never found a loophole. You were the loophole.
You don't get to feel superior for being a pussy.
translation.es: No puedes sentirte superior por ser marica.

translation.en: I did what I had to do... to protect us.
translation.es: Hice lo que había que hacer para protegernos.

translation.en: Agent Raymond Young...
will write the names of all the other agents of the Kira task force
translation.es: nombrará a los demás agentes del caso Kira

translation.en: in the Death Note, placing each of their faces in his mind as he goes.
translation.es: en la Libreta Mortal, visualizando su rostro al hacerlo.

translation.en: When he's done, he will join them in climbing to a rooftop
translation.es: Al terminar, los acompañará a un tejado

translation.en: and leaping to his death.
If you want out, you're out. All I need is for you to give me the book.
translation.es: Si quieres salir, salte. Dame la libreta y listo.

translation.en: Are you insane? Do you think that I'd ever let you near that thing again?
translation.es: ¿Estás loca? ¿Crees que te dejaré acercarte a ella?

translation.en: You didn't read it.
What did you do?
Light Turner's heart stops beating at midnight.
translation.es: El corazón de Light Turner se para a medianoche.

translation.en: No... you're trying to kill me?
You're going to officially pass the book to me.
Then once I'm the keeper...
I'll burn your page.
That's why I couldn't let you save Watari. You can only burn one name and...
translation.es: Por eso maté a Watari. Solo puedes quemar un nombre.

translation.en: I wanted it to be yours.
There are so many fucking rules.
Now go get my goddamn book.
translation.es: Ve a buscar mi maldita libreta.

translation.en: Did you find Watari?
This is Detective Turner.
I want every unit looking for the individual known as L.
translation.es: Quiero a todas las unidades buscando a L.

translation.en: He should be considered armed and dangerous.
And I want my son put in protective custody until he's located. Now!
translation.es: Y custodien a mi hijo hasta que lo ubiquen. ¡Ya!

translation.en: Let's go! This way! Move, move!
- Fuck! -
Be on the lookout for Light Turner,
last seen in the vicinity of North Seattle High.
Hey!
Light!
Hey, asshole!
Move! Move! Move! Move!
Hold it right there! Stop! Repeat...
Hey!
Sorry! Sorry! Sorry!
- Light! - Ah!
Wait! Wait! Wait!
Didn't I clearly explain what would happen if Watari wasn't safely returned to me?
translation.es: ¿No fui claro cuando dije que quería a Watari sano y salvo?

translation.en: Wait! You need to understand how it works, okay? Or you can't stop it!
translation.es: ¡Si no entiendes cómo funciona no podrás detenerlo!

translation.en: I couldn't stop it! Death can be handed out through a fucking calculus book!
translation.es: ¡Yo no pude! ¡La muerte va en un puto libro de cálculo!

translation.en: - You're stalling! - No, I'm not! I swear I'm not, okay?
I'm just gonna turn around really slowly.
Okay. I'm gonna reach into my bag.
translation.es: Bien. Voy a abrir mi mochila.

translation.en: Don't move! Do not move!
This man is Kira. I'm working with law enforcement.
translation.es: Es Kira. Soy de las fuerzas del orden.

translation.en: - In order to capture and eliminate-- -
Lord Kira.
Yeah. Yeah.
Come on! Let's go! Come with me!
Where the fuck is the book, Light?
- Come on! - We're actually closed, guys.
Take us to the top! Nobody else gets on, hear me?
Here. Want the book? Get in!
- What the fuck is your problem? - Take us to the top! Now!
Hit the button!
We gotta stop doing this. We gotta stop doing all of this.
translation.es: Tenemos que parar esto. Se acabó.

translation.en: It's already done!
Let's run away together and never use the Death Note again.
translation.es: Huyamos. No volvamos a usar la libreta jamás.

translation.en: I don't want to run away!
Now give me my fucking book, okay?
Take it! But...
just remember what it's done. Not just out there, but to us.
translation.es: Pero recuerda lo que hizo. No solo a los demás. A nosotros.

translation.en: If you love me...
If you love me, then you gotta trust me.
translation.es: Si me amas, confía en mí.

translation.en: Don't take the book.
Because if you do...
you'll never see me again.
I love you so much.
You do?
- Light! - Dad?
Light!
No!
What?
What?
What did you do?
You put my name in it, didn't you?
It was if you took the book. I thought I could convince you not to.
translation.es: Solo si la tomabas. Creí que iba a convencerte.

translation.en: Are you kidding me, Light?
- You put my name in the book! I got mad. - Are you kidding me?!
You said you love me! I thought you wouldn't take the book!
translation.es: ¡Dijiste que me amabas! ¡Creí que no la tomarías!

translation.en: Light!
Light! Light!
- - Oh, shit!
Ryuk! I take it back! I take it back!
Here, just hold on! Don't let go!
Please don't let me go! Don't let me fall!
Four new killings.
And every one of them identified by the news media in the last 48 hours.
translation.es: Todas identificadas por los medios en las últimas 48 horas.

translation.en: I understand you think this means Light cannot be Kira.
translation.es: Entiendo que interpretas que Light no es Kira.

translation.en: You think he's knocking people off while in a coma?
I'm not exactly sure how it is--
Apparently, you have enough highly- placed allies to keep you out of jail.
translation.es: Parece que tienes aliados de alto nivel que te permiten no ir preso.

translation.en: But none of that's gonna help you if we see you around.
translation.es: Pero nada de eso te ayudará si te vemos por aquí.

translation.en: Wait, you need to understand how it works, okay, or you can't stop it!
translation.es: ¡Si no entiendes cómo funciona no podrás detenerlo!

translation.en: I couldn't! Death can be handed out through a fucking calculus book!
translation.es: ¡Yo no pude! ¡La muerte va en una puto libro de cálculo!

translation.en: Was there a calculus book seized at Light Turner's house?
translation.es: ¿Hallaron un libro de cálculo de Turner?

translation.en: Did he even take Calculus?
Okay, what about his, uh... his girlfriend?
Don't take off!
Come in.
Hey, Dad.
What's wrong?
It was you.
All along.
What are you talking about?
In your room.
At first, I couldn't figure out how or why it'd gotten out of my safe.
translation.es: No entendía cómo había salido de mi caja fuerte. MUERTE DE ESPOSA DE POLICÍA

translation.en: Then it hit me.
James Brode wasn't the first victim.
translation.es: Brode no fue la primera víctima.

translation.en: It was Antony Skomal.
How?
Do you really want to know?
Dr. Norman Ludlam,
known for sexually assaulting female patients under sedation.
translation.es: conocido por atacar sexualmente a pacientes sedadas.

translation.en: On the night of October 12th, Norman Ludlam is present at the pier
translation.es: La noche del 12 de octubre, Ludlam está en el muelle

translation.en: when two individuals fall from the Northwest Ferris Wheel.
translation.es: cuando dos personas caen de la rueda.

translation.en: He rescues the male suspect from the water
and manages to revive him, saving his life.
translation.es: y logra reanimarlo. Le salva la vida.

translation.en: Using his connections at the hospital,
Ludlam keeps the suspect in a medically- induced coma for two days.
translation.es: ...Ludlam mantiene al sospechoso dos días en coma farmacológico.

translation.en: At the end of this period, he leaps to his death from the roof of the hospital.
translation.es: Luego, muere al saltar del tejado del hospital.

translation.en: Aaron Peltz. Mailman, retired.
Molested nearly a dozen children over the span of 20 years.
translation.es: Acosó a una decena de niños en el curso de 20 años.

translation.en: Peltz retrieves the Death Note from the river on October 12th.
translation.es: Halla la Libreta Mortal en el río el 12 de octubre.

translation.en: Each night, Peltz fills in the blanks with the name of criminals
translation.es: Cada noche, anota los nombres de los criminales

translation.en: who appear on the news.
On day two, he returns the Death Note to the Kira suspect,
translation.es: El segundo día, devuelve la libreta al sospechoso de ser Kira

translation.en: and then commits suicide.
♪ When the world outside's Too much to take ♪
Mia Sutton is killed when she accepts the Death Note from her boyfriend.
translation.es: Mia Sutton muere al tomar la Libreta Mortal.

translation.en: As the Northwest Ferris Wheel mysteriously collapses...
translation.es: Cuando la rueda en el muelle se desmorona,

translation.en: she pulls the page with my name on it from the note.
translation.es: arranca la hoja en la que anotó mi nombre.

translation.en: And it is ultimately consumed by fire.
translation.es: Luego, el fuego consume la hoja.

translation.en: Although her boyfriend lands safely in the water...
translation.es: Su novio cae al agua y se salva,

translation.en: Mia strikes the shoreline...
dying instantly.
I made a lot of mistakes.
And then I tried to fix them, but it didn't work.
I thought it was simple at first: I was just gonna kill all the bad guys
translation.es: Al principio parecía simple: matar a los malos

translation.en: and the good guys would win, but it wasn't like that.
translation.es: y que ganaran los buenos. Pero no fue así.

translation.en: It's like you said...
sometimes you gotta choose the lesser of the two evils.
translation.es: A veces hay que elegir el mal menor.

translation.en: Which one are you, son?
What?
You humans are so interesting.
translation.es: Ustedes los humanos son tan interesantes.
